Authors:
Marina Capelari, Fernanda Karstedt, Jadson José Souza de
Oliveira
Title: Favolaschia in remnants of the Atlantic Forest, Brazil
Keywords:
Basidiomycota, biodiverstiy, Mycenaceae, Tropical South
America
Abstract:
The examination of recent collections of Favolaschia from
remnants of the Atlantic Forest, Brazil, resulted in the identification
of F. aurantiaca, F. cinnabarina and F. luteoaurantiaca sp. nov. ITS
sequences obtained from these collections were introduced into the
previously published phylogenetic tree of the genus to assess the
position of these species within the Favolaschia clade. A Maximum
Likelihood analysis generated a phylogenetic tree with a better
resolution, especially for the clade that contains species belonging to
the section Favolaschia subsection Auriscalpium, where the three
Brazilian specimens also branched. Furthermore, F. cinnabarina was
confirmed within the section Auriscalpium clade.
